value:
content=This Belgian run bar and restaurant is a pleasant distraction from Siping's sometimes chaotic bars and restaurants. With a menu that includes skeaks, hamburgers, stews - as well as its selection of over 40 Belgian beers - you can experience the best of the west, in the heart of Siping.

Darts tournaments, daily Happy Hour (7pm-8pm) and a friendly, English speaking staff will make any Westerner feel at home in this pleasant bar - not to mention the luxurious restaurant that sits above it.
address=12 South Yingbin Road, Tiexi District
address=104 Xinhua Avenue (新华大街104号; Xīnhuádàjiē
directions=On the east of the city government site and next to Nanhu Park
content=The only four star hotel in town.  Sauna, hair salon, business center, supermarket, book shop, international travel agency, bar and coffee shop available
